name: Baby Swap or Shop
overview:
Founded in 2010 Baby Swap or Shop is the new UK’s selling and buying platform for parents.

Baby Swap or Shop is a community-based website of local areas that covers the UK, each page offering items for sale, swap or wanted.

We facilitate mums and dads to upload their unwanted items for sale/swap or ‘wanted’ posts free of charge with the ability to search by category as well as postcode radius.

We also have a separate ‘Marketplace’ section whereby small companies and WAHM’s can advertise their products and services for a small fee. There are added benefits for using this section of our site.

Our Values & Aims

  • We are a community orientated website with the needs of growing families at the fore-front;
  • Helping parents and children to help themselves…
  • To help growing families
  • To promote recycling and reduce waste
  • To help support poorly children in the UK via our chosen charity; CLIC Sargent
  • To become a one-stop community for mums and dads
